skills.skill: CAD Modeling (CATIA, Capital NX, Solidworks, Mentor Graphics CAP-H)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the design of wire harness and electrical distribution systems for automotive vehicles.
Translate OEM wiring requirements into 2D wiring drawings and evaluate harness designs.
Root cause electrical wiring issues and provide technical interface to the advanced wiring team.
Assess and package harness designs, attend design reviews, and coordination meetings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Electrical or Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent work experience.
